column1: # This file contains information on how the ETL output is mapped to different inexes in Elastic Search
column2: and the settings for each of those indexes.

column1: #   - input: is the folder under <data_release>/output/etl/json where the ETL output data for that particular index is stored.
#   - index_name: is the name of the index in Elastic Search.
#   - id: is the name of the field in the ETL output
column3: that will be used as the id for the Elastic Search document.

column1: #   - index_settings: is the name of the file that contains the settings for the index in Elastic Search.
